attributes.action: Identify the true number of people who would rather leave Europe with NO DEAL .
attributes.background: We are seeing more and more information being put around suggesting that article 50 should be revoked, in truth, we as a nation have already decided to leave Europe. The 1mpeople who have signed a petition to revoke article 50 are insignificant to the true number who would rather leave with NO DEAL

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to identify the true number of people who would rather leave Europe with no deal. 

You might like to sign and share this petition instead: 

Inclusion of No Deal Brexit be a condition for any second referendum. https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245516
